definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: It's thought the counting and collation of the presidential votes could take the longest.
sentences.chinese: 据测总统大选选票的计算和收集将会花费最长时间。

sentences.english: DSK was expected to win next year’s French presidential election.
sentences.chinese: DSK被认为有希望在法国明年总统大选中获胜。

sentences.english: The nineteen fifty-two presidential election will be our story next week.
sentences.chinese: 十九五十二总统大选将于下周我们的故事。

sentences.english: The final days of the 2008 race for president.
sentences.chinese: 下面介绍美国2008年总统大选最后几天的选情。

sentences.english: A peace treaty in two thousand seven led to the presidential election last year.
sentences.chinese: 一项二零零七达成的和平协议导致了去年的总统大选。

sentences.english: In the election of nineteen forty-eight, Truman ran for a full term.
sentences.chinese: 在1948年的竞选中，杜鲁门参加总统大选。

sentences.english: This will be the fifth campaign she covers.
sentences.chinese: 这将是她报道的第五次总统大选。

sentences.english: And that head-to-head race ends on Election Day when the voters cast their ballots.
sentences.chinese: 而这场势均力敌的竞赛将在总统大选日结束。

definition: Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4

definition: to take part in an election/to run for office
Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
